comment: Prof Roy simplifies the learning rules and concepts that go along with mastering a foreign language.  Was very communicative about assignments, and very helpful.  Kept the subject interesting.

Roy is an amazing teacher!! Attendance is required, but he definitely makes the class fun and interesting. He only speaks in Spanish for the upper level classes so you really have to pay attention. However, he IS REALLY understanding for just about any situation. He is now teaching in Michigan but i would definitely recommend his class!! :)
Really nice and funny. Made an effort to incorporate culture into the class which made it more interesting. Had to do one big project near the end of the semester, but it wasn't bad.

Roy was an awesome teacher for me, and was extremely helpful. He jokes around quite a bit and will make fun of you if you aren't focused. He is my favorite professor thusfar...I even signed up for his 2002/03 class because I like his teaching style.

He is a decent Spanish instructor, but his communication style can make for a frustrating experience.  I found him to be difficult to talk to after class.  When I spoke to him about a grading question, he cut me off in mid-sentence and did not answer my question.  Too many group projects where a large % of grade is at stake in group work.
Awesome professor. Very helpful and makes spanish actually interesting. 3 tests and 1 group project. Uses quia a lot. Attendance is mandatory but the class isn't too bad.
Class was pretty simple. He basically taught from the text book. He was really helpful and made learning spanish pretty fun.
Excellent teacher! he really cares about his students and will offer any help that you ask for. tests are fairly easy! definitely recommend!
